reasoning: Congenital hypothyroidism without thyroid enlargement, screened universally in many countries. Estimated incidence ~1-2 per 100k births based on neonatal screening programs.
source: Rose SR. Congenital hypothyroidism: clinical review and guide to neonatal screening programs. Pediatr Endocrinol Rev. 2006 Dec;3(Suppl 1):228-248
